tool_description: API that shows all the latest art news from the most popular news websites in the world.
name: Art News Live
title: Art News Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about art from a specific news website.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://art-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "art-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://art-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "art-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Art News
api_list.description: Will return all art news involving different mediums.
